author: daneofurexistence

text: The only reason you could even expect such a crazy track when fighting a boss was because you were already exposed to the other amazing stage themes composed by the Follin brothers. The sound quality of this track is enough to counter the fact that there's not much melody and variety going on, and it's just something special to fight a boss on the SNES while this is playing.
author: SupraDarky
